thread.section_title: Replacement Lens Express Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Replacement Lens Express | replacementlensexpress.com
thread.title: William
thread.title_full: Replacement Lens Express reviewed by William

author: William
title: William
text: It's true that small companies often give better customer service because each customer matters more to the bottom line. My order took a little longer than expected because they felt the quality of the finished product needed reworking. I was informed. My order ultimately shipped with the high-quality product I expected. This was my second order I placed with this company and I will use them again.
